task.title: Orchestrate : .Default Team Members vOctober-23
task.shortdesc: Created by William Abernathy on Sep 20, 2023

taskbody.context: The Default Team Members functionality enables you to specify team members for all accounts a given account owner (user) owns.

step.cmd: Use the lookup button to select a user that owns account records.
Use the lookup button to add team members in the Default Team Members section.

Select the team role for each user. You can add, change, or remove the Team Role picklist values in the Team Members object. To set up team member roles: Now, when a new account owned by this user is created, their default team populates with these team members and team roles. Assign steps within your definitions to team members by choosing “Role” as the assignee type.

substep.cmd: In Setup, enter Objects in the Quick Find. Select Object Manager (or Objects in Salesforce Classic).
Add or edit any roles needed. See Editing Account Page Layouts for Roles to add the Team Member related list to your account page layouts.
Decide whether to apply the team you’ve configured to all accounts owned by the selected user by checking the On Save, Automatically Assigned Default Team Members checkbox.
